title: The Velvet Elite: Unforgettable Love
description: After a car crash, Liz is unsure of everything but her own name. She becomes surprised and titillated by a relationship that quickly blossoms with a handsome stranger. Lingering doubts and suspicions grow as she learns of his wifeâ€™s mysterious disappearance and teenage daughter who left shortly afterward. The Velvet Elite, a shadowy cabal, brings out parts of Liz's personality that she can't quite control. The questions get more desperate, more urgent, and time is running out. Memories come back slowly, peeling back layer after layer to answer the Who she is and what they want of her. But will the answers come too late? Author Emmy Waterford is a published poet making her long-form fiction debut with The Velvet Elite series. Waterford creates a singularly unique romantic heroine for our time in a sexy, fast-paced romantic thriller which combines elements of the "Fifty Shades" series, "Eyes Wide Shut" and the modern film classic "Memento". Her alluring writing style will leave you on the edge of your seat and begging for more.
author: Emmy Waterford
